name: Demon Chaos
description:
It is a time of great unrest in Japan. Feudal clans clash in battle.
Amidst the chaos, demons have appeared to ravage this tormented land.
Take control of Inugami, the embodiment of the God of War.
You will be plunged into battle with thousands of on-screen enemies as you fight to cleanse the land of the demon horde.
Recruit allies, fight strategic battles, upgrade weapons, and use devastating spirit attacks to win the war against the beasts of evil.

65,000 enemies on-screen at once!
